743830.name: SuperTrucks Offroad Racing
743830.description:
Inspired by the arcade/NES classic racing game - Super Offroad, SuperTrucks Offroad Racing brings you a modern take on the beloved classic.

TOUGH OFF ROAD RACING CONDITIONS
Race off road in conditions such as sand, mud, snow and tarmac, giving you plenty of racing variety.

CUSTOMISE YOUR TRUCK
Pimp your ride with a selection of paints, decals and tyre sets ranging from common to legendary!
Unlock more cosmetic items for your truck as you progress in the game and collect crates...

UPGRADE
The racing action starts off slow but as you upgrade, things get faster...
The further you progress, the faster the AI will become and the better your drifting and management of nitro will need to be.

Upgrade your ENGINE, EXHAUST, TYRES, SUSPENSION and NITRO to best suit your racing style!

SEMI-REALISTIC RACING
The driving model is semi-realistic and drifting around corners using nitro at the right time is the key to good racing.

AERIAL CONTROL
In the 2.3 update, we have added aerial control, allowing you to do backips and 360 spins while hitting those big airs.

OVERHAULED AI
In the 2.3 update, we have completely overhauled the AI system, the AI is now challenging more than ever.

CONTROLLER SUPPORT IN-RACE
Racing with a controller is supported in-race only. Key bindings can be set in Settings.
We will be releasing a brand new, overhauled UI for the game in the next 2.4 update, which will provide full controller menu support.

CAREER MODE
Race in 7 cities across the US, with each city having its own challenging boss to beat.
Unlock hardcore mode once you've beaten all 7 race bosses.

DAILY LEADERBOARD EVENTS
Enter the Long Jump, Time Trial and Obstacle Course events.
Cosmetic items and currency are granted to each player who finishes in the Top 5 positions daily.
